nodes.text: "Bureaucracy Blues" was a song that the anti-Imperial band Red Shift Limit wrote and performed. Limited Warfare, one of their compiliation albums available between the years 0 ABY and 4 ABY contained the track and was banned by the Imperial Board of Culture.

The song "Bureaucracy Blues" was briefly referenced in Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim, which was written by Simon Smith and Eric S. Trautmann to supplement West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
